accuRx | Junior and Senior Software Engineers, Operations Manager | London, UK | ONSITE https://www.accurx.com/careers

accuRx is on a mission to fix communication in healthcare.

Currently, we let GP practices communicate with their patients, team and other organisations. We’ve grown from being used in a handful of organisations at the beginning of 2018, to now being in over 1,100 practices that send over 17,000 messages a day to patients – improving care and saving staff over half an hour each day.

Over the next 12 months we’re growing our practice base in the UK and rolling out exciting new products to enable the future of primary care.

Apply here: https://www.accurx.com/careers
